thread.title: FreedomWorks Rails Against GOP's 'Obamacare-Lite' Repeal Plan
thread.title_full: FreedomWorks Rails Against GOP's 'Obamacare-Lite' Repeal Plan

author: Tierney Sneed
title: FreedomWorks Rails Against GOP's 'Obamacare-Lite' Repeal Plan
text:
A conservative group with ties to the Tea Party movement railed against the Obamacare repeal legislation released by House leadership this week.
A statement Tuesday from Jason Pye, director of public policy and legislative affairs at FreedomWorks, labeled the bill "ObamaCare-lite" and argued that it "creates a new entitlement." He pointed to an alternative repeal bill introduced last month in the Senate by Sen. Rand Paul (R-KY) and in the House by Rep. Mark Sanford (R-SC), which has already won the backing of the influential House Freedom Caucus.
Read More â†’
